title: Bogor
summary: Bogor (Sundanese: ᮘᮧᮌᮧᮁ, Dutch: Buitenzorg) is a landlocked city in the West Java province, Indonesia. Located around 60 kilometers (37 mi) south of the national capital of Jakarta, Bogor is the 6th largest city of Jakarta metropolitan area and the 14th nationwide.[4] The city covers an area of 118.50 km2, and it had a population of 950,334 at the 2010 Census[5] and 1,043,070 at the 2020 Census.[6] Bogor is an important economic, scientific, cultural and tourist center, as well as a mountain resort.
